title: Kemono wa Ai de, Iyasareru
description:
As the son of a huge enterprise, Kazuki had always been starving for real affection – and the appearance of Saijou Chiharu rescued him from that miserable life. However, one day a suspicious document came, claiming that Chiharu has plans to take over the whole group. Because of that document, Chiharu's unknown past was exposed...!?

[b][u]Polish / Polski:[/u][/b]
[spoiler]
Rozdział 1: W tym rozdziale dowiadujemy się trochę więcej o przeszłości Chiharu - jego rodzinie, dlaczego pracuje dla korporacji Toudou.
Opis ze strony Yaoi Heaven
